channel.title: Support for Polls!
channel.description:
So it turns out, we have support for Polls! To make a poll all you need to do is insert this code
```bash [poll] - Awesome - Super Awesome [/poll] ```
And it makes this. So. What do you think of this feature?
[poll] - Awesome - Super Awesome [/poll]

item.title: Support for Polls!
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
So it turns out, we have support for Polls! To make a poll all you need to do is insert this code

[poll]
- Awesome
- Super Awesome
[/poll]

And it makes this. So. What do you think of this feature?

Click to view the poll.

Read full topic
